reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and thoughtful discussions. However, the grading can be a bit strict.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but the course is very challenging. Office hours are limited.

reviews.subject: American History
reviews.review: Fantastic lecturer with a passion for the subject. Makes history come alive.

reviews.subject: Calculus II
reviews.review: Difficult to follow and doesnâ€™t provide enough examples. Needs to be more approachable.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Clear explanations and interactive classes. Could use more real-world applications.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Very engaging and enthusiastic. Makes complex concepts easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting topics but sometimes disorganized. Could benefit from more structured lectures.

reviews.subject: World Literature
reviews.review: Great at facilitating discussions and providing insightful analysis. Assignments are a bit heavy.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Excellent teaching style with lots of practical examples. Always available for help.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Sociology
reviews.review: Decent lectures but sometimes lacks depth. Course material could be more engaging.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject and provides good real-world applications. Could improve feedback on assignments.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Very helpful and approachable. Explains difficult concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes lectures can be a bit dry. More interactive sessions would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Finance
reviews.review: Incredibly knowledgeable with a real-world focus. Provides excellent career advice.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Great at explaining complex coding concepts. Could improve on providing timely feedback on projects.

reviews.subject: Astrophysics
reviews.review: Fascinating subject but the course can be quite challenging. More help sessions would be beneficial.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Knowledgeable and enthusiastic. Provides lots of interesting insights into various art periods.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Programming
reviews.review: Excellent instructor with clear, step-by-step explanations. Very supportive of students.

reviews.subject: Advanced Statistics
reviews.review: Very challenging course with a fast pace. Needs to offer more support and clarification.

reviews.subject: Sociology of Family
reviews.review: Provides a lot of real-life examples and is very approachable. Could use more varied assessments.

reviews.subject: Cultural Anthropology
